comment: Factory class for creating integrity formulas based on installer.

methods.name: public static IntegrityFormula packageNameEquals(@NonNull String installerName)
methods.comment: Returns an integrity formula that checks the equality to an installer name.

methods.name: public static IntegrityFormula notAllowedByManifest()
methods.comment:
* An static formula that evaluates to true if the installer is NOT allowed according to the
         * "allowed installer" field in the android manifest.

methods.name: public static IntegrityFormula certificatesContain(@NonNull String installerCertificate)
methods.comment:
* Returns an integrity formula that checks if the installer certificates contain {@code
         * installerCertificate}.

methodNames: public static IntegrityFormula packageNameEquals(@NonNull String installerName)
public static IntegrityFormula certificatesContain(@NonNull String installerCertificate)
